title: On Addressing the Limitations of Graph Neural Networks. (arXiv:2306.12640v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: This report gives a summary of two problems about graph convolutional networks (GCNs): over-smoothing and heterophily challenges, and outlines future directions to explore.
context:
Title: On Addressing the Limitations of Graph Neural Networks. (arXiv:2306.12640v1 [cs.LG])
Abstract: This report gives a summary of two problems about graph convolutional networks (GCNs): over-smoothing and heterophily challenges, and outlines future directions to explore.
translated_title: 解决图神经网络的局限性
translated_abstract: 本文总结了关于图卷积网络（GCNs）的两个问题：过度平滑和异质性挑战，并概述了未来要探索的方向。
tldr: 本文讨论了图神经网络的两个挑战：过度平滑和异质性，提出了解决方案并展望了未来的研究方向。
en_tdlr: This paper discusses two challenges of graph neural networks: over-smoothing and heterophily, proposes solutions, and outlines future research directions.
